text: A View to a Kill is a 1985 British American spy action movie directed by John Glen and is the 14th movie in the James Bond franchise. It stars Roger Moore, Christopher Walken, Grace Jones, Tanya Roberts, Patrick Macnee, David Yip, Willoughby Gray, Alison Doody, Robert Brown, Lois Maxwell, Geoffrey Keen, Desmond Llewelyn, Dolph Lundgren and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. The British pop band Duran Duran sing the title song of the movie. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1980s spy movies Category:1985 action movies Category:American spy movies Category:1980s American action movies Category:James Bond movies Category:MGM movies Category:Roger Moore Category:Movies directed by John Glen Category:Movies composed by John Barry Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in Paris Category:Movies set in Russia Category:Movies set in San Francisco Category:Movies about technology Category:Cold War movies
title: A View to a Kill
